en: I was hungry and thirsty.
zh: 我又饿又渴。

en: I want to be a pilot when I grow up.
zh: 我长大后想当一名飞行员。

en: I was named after my uncle.
zh: 我以我叔叔的名字命名。

en: I am boarding with my uncle.
zh: 我和我叔叔住在一起。

en: I am staying with my uncle.
zh: 我住在我的叔叔家。

en: I was hired by my uncle.
zh: 我被我叔叔雇佣了。

en: I was given a nice present by my uncle.
zh: 我叔叔送给我一件很棒的礼物。

en: I sponged a dinner off my uncle.
zh: 我蹭了我叔叔一顿饭。

en: I stayed with my uncle.
zh: 我住在我的叔叔家。

en: I've never been to my uncle's house.
zh: 我从来没去过我叔叔家。

en: I spoke to my uncle on the telephone.
zh: 我给我的叔叔打了电话。

en: I was given a nice watch by my uncle.
zh: 我叔叔送给我一块漂亮的手表。

en: I was forced to make a bow.
zh: 我被迫鞠了一躬。

en: I received a telegram saying that my uncle had arrived.
zh: 我收到一封电报，说我叔叔到了。

en: I've never been to my grandfather's house.
zh: 我从来没去过我爷爷家。

en: I want to ride a motorcycle.
zh: 我想骑摩托车。

en: I'm from Australia.
zh: 我来自澳大利亚。

en: I come from Australia.
zh: 我来自澳大利亚。

en: I've been to Australia three times.
zh: 我去过澳大利亚三次。

en: I want to travel to Australia.
zh: 我想去澳大利亚旅行。

en: I'm saving up so that I can go to Australia.
zh: 我正在攒钱，这样我就可以去澳大利亚了。

en: I visited American friends in Oakland.
zh: 我拜访了在奥克兰的美国朋友。

en: I have a big dog.
zh: 我有一只大狗。
